name: Infiltration (itch) (capt_entropy)
description:
This is a game where you have to throw knives at the ninjas that seek to destroy you and survive the brutal war.

Health and Score Texts were working in the unity game window but after the build, they disappeared due to a mysterious reason. Trying to fix that bug and shall release a later build where everything works, but this is an early access build so that people get the gist of how this game is supposed to be. Here you go and have fun with the game! Don't forget to comment your scores down below!
